# equiv in json, but note that cant easly tags like gte and contins:

list("_and" =
       list(
         list("gte" = list("inventor_last_name" = "Jobs")),
         list("_or" =
                list(
                  list("some_tag" =  "some value"),
                  list("some_other_tag" = "some_other_value"),
                  list("another_tag" = "another_value")
                  )
              ),
         list("assignee_lastknown_country" = "US")
         )
     ) -> k
